code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Router,Link,navigate}from'@reach/router';import axios from'axios';var Delete=function Delete(props){var projectId=props.projectId;var statusUpdate=function statusUpdate(e){e.preventDefault();axios.delete("http://localhost:8000/api/projects/"+projectId,{}).then(function(res){console.log(res.data);props.Update();}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{style:{marginLeft:"200px"},className:"button is-danger is outlined",type:"submit",onClick:statusUpdate}," Remove project ");};export default Delete;
